CancelUpdateStack.name: CancelUpdateStack
CancelUpdateStack.description: Cancels an update on the specified stack.

ContinueUpdateRollback.name: ContinueUpdateRollback
ContinueUpdateRollback.description:
For a specified stack that is in the UPDATE_ROLLBACK_FAILED state, continues rolling
                                                it back to the UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state.

CreateChangeSet.name: CreateChangeSet
CreateChangeSet.description: Creates a list of changes for a stack.

CreateStack.name: CreateStack
CreateStack.description: Creates a stack as specified in the template.

CreateStackInstances.name: CreateStackInstances
CreateStackInstances.description: Creates stack instances for the specified accounts, within the specified regions.

CreateStackSet.name: CreateStackSet
CreateStackSet.description: Creates a stackset as specified in the template.

DeleteChangeSet.name: DeleteChangeSet
DeleteChangeSet.description:
Deletes the specified change set. Deleting change sets ensures that no one executes
                                                the wrong change set.

DeleteStackInstances.name: DeleteStackInstances
DeleteStackInstances.description: Deletes stack instances for the specified accounts, in the specified regions.

DeregisterType.name: DeregisterType
DeregisterType.description: Deregisters an existing CloudFormation type or type version

DescribeAccountLimits.name: DescribeAccountLimits
DescribeAccountLimits.description: Retrieves your account's AWS CloudFormation limits.

DescribeChangeSet.name: DescribeChangeSet
DescribeChangeSet.description: Returns the description for the specified change set.

DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus.name: DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus
DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus.description: Returns information about a stack drift detection operation.

DescribeStackEvents.name: DescribeStackEvents
DescribeStackEvents.description: Returns all stack related events for a specified stack.

DescribeStackInstance.name: DescribeStackInstance
DescribeStackInstance.description:
Returns the stack instance that's associated with the specified stack set, AWS account,
                                                and region.

DescribeStackResource.name: DescribeStackResource
DescribeStackResource.description: Returns a description of the specified resource in the specified stack.

DescribeStackResourceDrifts.name: DescribeStackResourceDrifts
DescribeStackResourceDrifts.description:
Returns drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the
                                                specified stack.

DescribeStackResources.name: DescribeStackResources
DescribeStackResources.description: Returns AWS resource descriptions for running and deleted stacks.

DescribeStackSet.name: DescribeStackSet
DescribeStackSet.description: Returns the description of the specified stack set.

DescribeStackSetOperation.name: DescribeStackSetOperation
DescribeStackSetOperation.description: Returns the description of the specified stack set operation.

DescribeStacks.name: DescribeStacks
DescribeStacks.description: Returns the description for the specified stack.

DescribeType.name: DescribeType
DescribeType.description: Returns information about the CloudFormation type requested

DescribeTypeRegistration.name: DescribeTypeRegistration
DescribeTypeRegistration.description: Returns information about the registration process for a CloudFormation type

DetectStackDrift.name: DetectStackDrift
DetectStackDrift.description:
Detects whether a stack's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from it's
                                                expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any values specified
                                                as template parameters.

DetectStackResourceDrift.name: DetectStackResourceDrift
DetectStackResourceDrift.description:
Returns information about whether a resource's actual configuration differs, or has
                                                drifted, from it's expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any
                                                values specified as template parameters.

DetectStackSetDrift.name: DetectStackSetDrift
DetectStackSetDrift.description:
Enables users to detect drift on a stack set and the stack instances that belong to
                                                that stack set.

EstimateTemplateCost.name: EstimateTemplateCost
EstimateTemplateCost.description: Returns the estimated monthly cost of a template.

ExecuteChangeSet.name: ExecuteChangeSet
ExecuteChangeSet.description:
Updates a stack using the input information that was provided when the specified change
                                                set was created.

GetStackPolicy.name: GetStackPolicy
GetStackPolicy.description: Returns the stack policy for a specified stack.

GetTemplate.name: GetTemplate
GetTemplate.description: Returns the template body for a specified stack.

GetTemplateSummary.name: GetTemplateSummary
GetTemplateSummary.description: Returns information about a new or existing template.

ListChangeSets.name: ListChangeSets
ListChangeSets.description:
Returns the ID and status of each active change set for a stack. For example, AWS
                                                CloudFormation lists change sets that are in the CREATE_IN_PROGRESS or CREATE_PENDING
                                                state.

ListExports.name: ListExports
ListExports.description:
Lists all exported output values in the account and region in which you call this
                                                action.

ListImports.name: ListImports
ListImports.description: Lists all stacks that are importing an exported output value.

ListStackInstances.name: ListStackInstances
ListStackInstances.description:
Returns summary information about stack instances that are associated with the specified
                                                stack set.

ListStackResources.name: ListStackResources
ListStackResources.description: Returns descriptions of all resources of the specified stack.

ListStackSetOperationResults.name: ListStackSetOperationResults
ListStackSetOperationResults.description: Returns summary information about the results of a stack set operation.

ListStackSetOperations.name: ListStackSetOperations
ListStackSetOperations.description: Returns summary information about operations performed on a stack set.

ListStackSets.name: ListStackSets
ListStackSets.description: Returns summary information about stack sets that are associated with the user.

ListStacks.name: ListStacks
ListStacks.description: Returns the summary information for stacks whose status matches the specified StackStatusFilter.

ListTypeVersions.name: ListTypeVersions
ListTypeVersions.description: Lists versions of a particular CloudFormation type

SetStackPolicy.name: SetStackPolicy
SetStackPolicy.description: Sets a stack policy for a specified stack.

SetTypeDefaultVersion.name: SetTypeDefaultVersion
SetTypeDefaultVersion.description: Sets which version of a CloudFormation type applies to CloudFormation operations

SignalResource.name: SignalResource
SignalResource.description: Sends a signal to the specified resource with a success or failure status.

StopStackSetOperation.name: StopStackSetOperation
StopStackSetOperation.description: Stops an in-progress operation on a stack set and its associated stack instances.

UpdateStack.name: UpdateStack
UpdateStack.description: Updates a stack as specified in the template.

UpdateStackInstances.name: UpdateStackInstances
UpdateStackInstances.description:
Updates the parameter values for stack instances for the specified accounts, within
                                                the specified regions.

UpdateStackSet.name: UpdateStackSet
UpdateStackSet.description: Updates a stackset as specified in the template.

UpdateTerminationProtection.name: UpdateTerminationProtection
UpdateTerminationProtection.description: Updates termination protection for the specified stack.
